key_risks: Patent litigation with Imperative Care, Inc. and Inquis Medical, Inc.
Securities class action lawsuit alleging misrepresentations or omissions
Regulatory scrutiny from FDA and EU MDR compliance
Competitive pressures in the vascular intervention market

Supply chain vulnerabilities affecting production and delivery
controversies: Potential conflicts of interest in reimbursement support
social_issues: Perceived conflicts of interest in reimbursement support
Over-reliance on company-provided documentation for billing purposes
governance_issues: Ongoing scrutiny of corporate governance practices
Potential impact of securities class action on governance

sources.title: Inari Medical - Gilde Healthcare
sources.snippet: Inari has developed best-in-class catheters for the treatment of venous disease, starting with thrombectomy for deep vein thrombosis and pulmonary embolism.
